✅ Implemented full quantum ghost layer effect for thinking animation

Based on the original quantum-fade.html test design, added true quantum superposition effect with ghost layers that split left/right.

## What was added:
1. **quantum-fade-text.css**: Added ::before and ::after pseudo-elements with attr(data-text) to create ghost layers
2. **quantum-fade-providers.css**: 
   - Added quantumSplit1 and quantumSplit2 animations for all providers (Claude, OpenAI, Gemini, Qwen, Default)
   - Ghost layers fade opacity (0 → 0.6 → 0) while splitting in opposite directions (±4px)
   - Each provider has unique ghost colors matching their brand
3. **ReasoningMessageBuilder.js**: Added data-text attribute to the quantum-text span

## Provider ghost colors:
- Claude: Warm orange tints
- OpenAI: Cool blue/white tints  
- Gemini: Purple/blue spectrum
- Qwen: Magenta/purple spectrum
- Default: Blue/purple fallback

The animation now has true depth with colored ghost layers creating a quantum superposition effect!

✅ Replaced static provider icon with 3D orbital rings spinner Created beautiful 3D rotating orbital rings animation for thinking indicator, replacing the static provider icon. ## What was created: 1. **orbital-rings.css**: New CSS file with 4 concentric rings that rotate in 3D space at different speeds (4s, 5s, 6s, 7s), scaled down to 16px for inline display 2. **Provider-specific colors**: Each provider (Claude, OpenAI, Gemini, Qwen) has unique color scheme for the 4 rings with glowing box-shadows 3. **ReasoningMessageBuilder.js**: Replaced `` tag with orbital rings HTML structure (4 orbit-ring divs) 4. **message-thinking.css**: Updated icon size to 16px and hid old image-based icons 5. **ui-messages-list.css**: Added import for orbital-rings.css ## Animation details: - Ring 1 (innermost): rotateX(60deg), 4s duration - Ring 2: rotateX(45deg), 5s duration - Ring 3: rotateX(30deg), 6s duration - Ring 4 (outermost): rotateX(15deg), 7s duration - Each ring fades opacity during rotation (0.3→1.0→0.3) - Provider-specific colors with glowing box-shadows The thinking indicator now has a mesmerizing 3D spinner instead of a static icon!
